channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024040114
item.description:
Report X-2024040114

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-08T15:12:24+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-26
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: UNLOADER FOUND PACKAGE THAT WAS EXTERNAL SOURCE AFFECTED. RESPONDER RESPONDED. UPON OPENING PACKAGE, FOUND LITHIUM ION BATTERIES, BUT NO WARNING LABEL ON BOX. FLAGGED PACKAGE AS POSSIBLE UNDECLARED HAZMAT AS PER UPS POLICY AND NOTIFIED SUPERVISOR.

item.title: Report X-2024040078
item.description:
Report X-2024040078

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-05T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-25
  • City: SPRINGFIELD
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS COMING DOWN THE BELT AND MOVING IT PRODUCED RATTLING NOISE SOUNDING LIKE AEROSOL CANS. UPON INSPECTION AERSOL CANS WERE FOUND IN THE PACKAGE. PACKAGE WAS PROCESSED AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT.

item.title: Report X-2024040076
item.description:
Report X-2024040076

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-05T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-23
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS AFFECTED BY ANOTHER LEAKER IN THE SYSTEM DURRING A CLEAN UP AND DURING REPACK AEROSOL WAS DISCOVERED IN THE PACKAGE WITHOUT PROPER MARKINGS, UNDECLARED AEROSOLS.

item.title: Report X-2024040074
item.description:
Report X-2024040074

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-05T15:11:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-21
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: TORN BOX SENT DOWN UNDERSLIDE. PSC CALLED AS PRESENCE OF AEROSOLS INDICATED POSSIBLE UNDECLARED. BROUGHT BACK TO PSC FOR PROCESSING. UPS PROCEDURE FOR POTENTIAL UNDECLARED HAZMATS WAS FOLLOWED.

  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS RETURNED TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING. ALL MERCHANDISE WAS DAMAGED BY THE SPILL. MERCHANDISE IS BEING PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP AS A LIQUID.
